attributes.action: Make the use of masks on public transport voluntary and not mandatory
attributes.background:
I would like the Government or Parliament to reverse the decision to mandate the use of masks on public transport and render it voluntary.

I believe that by mandating something so personal, the Government may be infringing on our civil liberties.
